summary: Results-driven Full Stack Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-impact features that improve user engagement by 40%.

Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, cutting infrastructure costs by $50K annually
